movies.title: Pulse 3
movies.plot: Seven years into the invasion, humankind has fled the cities where billions have died from a plague spread through the internet. JUSTINE (17) dreams of a life beyond her squalid refugee camp where all technology is taboo. She discovers the last working laptop and opens it like Pandora's Box. Someone is waiting for her online. And that someone wants desperately to meet her. The only catch, she must return to the city. With a longing that surpasses fear, Justine embarks on a terrifying journey back to the heart of where it all began. What waits there is something she could not possibly have imagined.
movies.simplePlot: A restless girl embarks on a journey back to a city populated by the dead in search of a mysterious internet lover.

biography.placeOfBirth: New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Actress Noureen DeWulf was born in New York and raised in Georgia. Her parents are from Pune, India. She was educated at Boston University's School of the Arts. One of DeWulf's first roles was in the Oscar winning short West Bank Story (2005). Acting success continued with roles in TV hits such as CSI: NY (2004), Numb3rs (2005), Outsourced (2010) and Hawthorne (2009). Feature film projects include Ocean's Thirteen (2007) and Ghosts of Girlfriends Past (2009). In 2012, DeWulf was cast alongside Charlie Sheen in the TV series Anger Management (2012).
biography.name: Noureen DeWulf

biography.bio: Rider Strong was born on December 11, 1979 in San Francisco, California, USA as Rider King Strong. He is an actor and director, known for Boy Meets World (1993), Cabin Fever (2002) and The Dungeon Master (2011). He has been married to Alexandra Barreto since October 20, 2013. They have one child.
biography.name: Rider Strong

biography.bio: Lynn Blackburn is an actress, known for American Crime (2015), The Leftovers (2014) and Friday Night Lights (2006).
biography.name: Lynn Blackburn

biography.bio: Jackie Arnold is an actor, known for I Sell the Dead (2008), Pulse 3 (2008) and 200 American (2003).
biography.name: Jackie Arnold

biography.bio: Brittany Renee Finamore is an actress, known for Things Behind the Sun (2001), Forget Me Not (2009) and Babysitters Beware (2009).
biography.name: Brittany Renee Finamore

biography.bio: Georgina was born in London, went to St Pauls School before attending boarding school at Downe House. Her A-Levels were completed at St. Edwards School, Oxford where she also went to University. She obtained a BA Honours degree in Politics at Oxford Brookes University.
biography.name: Georgina Rylance

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Robert Gibson yet.
biography.name: Robert Gibson

biography.bio: William Prael is an actor, known for The Collector (2009), The Prophecy II (1998) and Dracula 2000 (2000).
biography.name: William Prael

biography.bio: Laura Cayouette was born on July 11, 1964 in Laurel, Maryland, USA. She is an actress and writer, known for Django Unchained (2012), Enemy of the State (1998) and Now You See Me (2013). She has been married to Andy Gallagher since May 24, 2014.
biography.name: Laura Cayouette

biography.bio: Karley Scott Collins is an actress, known for When You Find Me (2011), Once Upon a Time (2011) and Amish Grace (2010).
biography.name: Karley Scott Collins

biography.bio: Born in Hannover, Germany in 1972, moved in 1973 and raised in England until 12 years old when his family moved to Simi Valley, California. On graduating high school, he worked in metal fabrication and then finally moved from 'sculpting' metal to clay, pursuing a life long passion of working on horror films. 2nd only to horror films, guitars, hard rock music and motorcyles.
biography.name: Snowy Highfield

biography.bio: Marcus M. Mauldin is an actor, known for Mr. Right (2015), Borderlands (2009) and Daikatana (2000).
biography.name: Marcus M. Mauldin

biography.bio: Thomas Merdis was born on September 4, 1945 in Frierson, Louisiana, USA as Merdis Thomas. He was an actor, known for My Cousin Vinny (1992), A Time to Kill (1996) and Super Mario Bros. (1993). He died on June 1, 2008 in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.
biography.name: Thomas Merdis

biography.bio: Diane Ayala Goldner was born on September 1, 1956. She is an actress, known for The Collector (2009), Feast II: Sloppy Seconds (2008) and Halloween II (2009). She has been married to John Gulager since 1986.
biography.name: Diane Ayala Goldner

biography.bio: Courtney Shay Young is known for her work on Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay (2008), Disaster Movie (2008) and Meet the Spartans (2008).
biography.name: Courtney Shay Young
